RuleSet.Name: schema/dbcreate/mysql/crsp_page_dbtablename_by_suffix.mysql
RuleSet.GenFile: -- -- @(#) $GenPackageDir$/$GenFileName$ $MssDoubleDashScriptLicense$ delimiter //// create procedure $poptop Table lower DbSchemaName$.$sp_page_dbtablename_by_suffix$($implMySqlSPStandardArgs$$iterate Columns( each sparg_CommaTableCol )$$poptop Table reference BaseClass reference PrimaryKeyIndex iterate Columns( each implMySqlSPSpecPriorArg )$ ) not deterministic reads sql data begin declare done boolean default false;$poptop Table switch SecScope None empty System empty Cluster implMySqlSPReadTableDeclPermFlag Tenant implMySqlSPReadTableDeclPermFlag default error$ declare continue handler for not found set done = true;$switch TableName Cluster empty Tenant empty SecUser empty default implMySqlSPReadEnforceSec$$switch TopTableName Cluster implMySqlSPPageTableRetSelectByIndexNormal Tenant implMySqlSPPageTableRetSelectByIndexNormal SecUser implMySqlSPPageTableRetSelectByIndexNormal default implMySqlSPPageTableRetSelectByIndexMakeChoice$ end;////
RuleSet.GenRule: $switch SecScope None implMySqlSPPageTableRetSelectByIndexNormal System implMySqlSPPageTableRetSelectByIndexNormal Cluster implMySqlSPPageTableRetSelectByIndexRestrictCluster Tenant implMySqlSPPageTableRetSelectByIndexRestrictTenant default error$

if( ( isSystemUser ) and ( $poptop Table reference BaseClass reference PrimaryKeyIndex iterate Columns( first implMySqlPriorNotNull each implMySqlAndPriorNotNull )$ ) ) then select $poptop Table implMySqlSelectTableColumns$, $poptop Table lower reference BaseClass ClassCode$.revision as revision from $poptop Table lower DbSchemaName$.$poptop Table DbTableName$ as $poptop Table lower ClassCode$$poptop Table switch HasSuperClassRelation yes implMySqlClassCodeJoinSuperTable default empty$ where $iterate Columns( first implMySqlIndexColumnWhereFragBindVar each implMySqlIndexColumnWhereAndFragBindVar )$$poptop Table restrictReadByIndexQuery$$poptop Table restrictAndBeforePrior$$switch IsUnique yes empty default implSPPageTableOrderByDescendingPKey$$implImposeTableLimit$; end if; if( ( isSystemUser ) and ( not ( $poptop Table reference BaseClass reference PrimaryKeyIndex iterate Columns( first implMySqlPriorNotNull each implMySqlAndPriorNotNull )$ ) ) ) then select $poptop Table implMySqlSelectTableColumns$, $poptop Table lower reference BaseClass ClassCode$.revision as revision from $poptop Table lower DbSchemaName$.$poptop Table DbTableName$ as $poptop Table lower ClassCode$$poptop Table switch HasSuperClassRelation yes implMySqlClassCodeJoinSuperTable default empty$ where $iterate Columns( first implMySqlIndexColumnWhereFragBindVar each implMySqlIndexColumnWhereAndFragBindVar )$$poptop Table restrictReadByIndexQuery$$switch IsUnique yes empty default implSPPageTableOrderByDescendingPKey$$implImposeTableLimit$; end if;$implMySqlSPPageTableRetSelectByIndexRestrictClusterPart2$

if( ( isSystemUser ) and ( $poptop Table reference BaseClass reference PrimaryKeyIndex iterate Columns( first implMySqlPriorNotNull each implMySqlAndPriorNotNull )$ ) ) then select $poptop Table implMySqlSelectTableColumns$, $poptop Table lower reference BaseClass ClassCode$.revision as revision from $poptop Table lower DbSchemaName$.$poptop Table DbTableName$ as $poptop Table lower ClassCode$$poptop Table switch HasSuperClassRelation yes implMySqlClassCodeJoinSuperTable default empty$ where $iterate Columns( first implMySqlIndexColumnWhereFragBindVar each implMySqlIndexColumnWhereAndFragBindVar )$$poptop Table restrictReadByIndexQuery$$poptop Table restrictAndBeforePrior$$switch IsUnique yes empty default implSPPageTableOrderByDescendingPKey$$implImposeTableLimit$; end if; if( ( isSystemUser ) and ( not ( $poptop Table reference BaseClass reference PrimaryKeyIndex iterate Columns( first implMySqlPriorNotNull each implMySqlAndPriorNotNull )$ ) ) ) then select $poptop Table implMySqlSelectTableColumns$, $poptop Table lower reference BaseClass ClassCode$.revision as revision from $poptop Table lower DbSchemaName$.$poptop Table DbTableName$ as $poptop Table lower ClassCode$$poptop Table switch HasSuperClassRelation yes implMySqlClassCodeJoinSuperTable default empty$ where $iterate Columns( first implMySqlIndexColumnWhereFragBindVar each implMySqlIndexColumnWhereAndFragBindVar )$$poptop Table restrictReadByIndexQuery$$switch IsUnique yes empty default implSPPageTableOrderByDescendingPKey$$implImposeTableLimit$; end if;$implMySqlSPPageTableRetSelectByIndexRestrictTenantPart2$
